BoolProperty.Name: WppEnabled
BoolProperty.Description: Enable WPP preprocessing on C/C++ source files.

BoolProperty.Name: WppDisplayWarnings
BoolProperty.Description: Display warnings for incompatible project configuration.

StringListProperty.Name: WppSourceFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Additional source files to be processed by WPP.

StringProperty.Name: WppAddControlGUID
StringProperty.Description: Defines a WPP_CONTROL_GUIDS macro with the specified control GUID and WPP_DEFINE_BIT entries named 'Error', 'Unusual', and 'Noise'. (-ctl:guid)

BoolProperty.Name: WppDllMacro
BoolProperty.Description: Defines the WPP_DLL macro. When this macro is defined, the WPP data structures are initialized whenever WPP_INIT_TRACING is called. Otherwise the structures are initialized only once. (-dll)

BoolProperty.Name: WppKernelMode
BoolProperty.Description: Defines the WPP_KERNEL_MODE macro, which traces kernel-mode components. By default, only user-mode components are traced. By default, only user-mode components are traced. (-km)

StringListProperty.Name: WppPreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Adds preprocessor defines to the beginning of the generated file. (-D:name|-D:name=value)

StringProperty.Name: WppModuleName
StringProperty.Description: Defines the name that will be displayed when decoding events, the default value displayed is the directory name. Used to connect events that are part of a logical module but in separate directories. (-p:string)

BoolProperty.Name: WppIgnoreExclamationmarks
BoolProperty.Description: Directs WPP to ignore exclamation marks, also known as 'shrieks' used in complex formatting, such as %!timestamp!. (-noshrieks)

IntProperty.Name: WppNumericBaseForFormatStrings
IntProperty.Description: Establishes a numeric base for numbering of format strings. (-argbase:number)

StringListProperty.Name: WppTraceFunction
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies alternatives to the DoTraceMessage function. (-func:functiondescription)

StringListProperty.Name: WppPublicFunctions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies trace functions which annotations are not stripped from public PDBs. (-public:function)

StringProperty.Name: WppSearchString
StringProperty.Description: Directs WPP to search the source files for the specified string to initiate tracing. (-lookfor:string)

StringProperty.Name: WppFileExtensions
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the file types that WPP recognizes as source files. (-ext:.ext1[.ext2])

StringProperty.Name: WppPreserveExtensions
StringProperty.Description: Preserves the specified file name extensions when creating TMH files. (-preserveext:.ext1[.ext2])

StringProperty.Name: WppOutputDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the directory for the output files that WPP creates. (-odir:path)

StringListProperty.Name: WppConfigurationDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the location of configuration and template files. (-cfgdir:path1[;path2])

StringProperty.Name: WppAlternateConfigurationFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies an alternate configuration file. WPP uses this file instead of the defaultwpp.ini file. (-defwpp:path)

StringProperty.Name: WppAdditionalConfigurationFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies an additional configuration file. WPP uses the specified file in addition to the default file, defaultwpp.ini. (-ini:path)

StringProperty.Name: WppGenerateUsingTemplateFile
StringProperty.Description: For every source file that WPP processes with the name specified between braces {}, create another file with the specified file name extension. (-gen{file.tpl}*.ext)

StringProperty.Name: WppScanConfigurationData
StringProperty.Description: Searches for configuration data, such as custom data types, in a file that is not a configuration file, as well as in defaultwpp.ini. (-scan:file)

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: WppBeforeTargets
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for the build customization to run before.
